translation.GTS: Gabriel Terra Simões - Computer Engineering Student, UNAERP
translation.GRP: Gabriel Reverso Pereira - Computer Engineering Student, UNAERP
translation.dev_note2: Codap was made by two computer engineering students from the University of Ribeirão Preto - UNAERP. Our intention with Codap is to expand the horizon of knowledge and, at the same time, bring a part of what can be done with WEB development to people who are curious or who want to be starting as a WEB developer. We hope you can have a good journey of knowledge with NAME OF THE MASCOT, our faithful helper.
